content.text:
HON. ANNA G. ESHOO

                             of california

                    in the house of representatives

                       Tuesday, November 7, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Ms. ESHOO. Mr. Speaker, I was not present during Roll Call vote 
numbers 564, 565, 566, 567 and 568 on October 12, 2017, because of a 
death in my family. Had I been present, I would have voted: on Roll 
Call no. 564, I would have voted YES; on Roll Call vote no. 565, I 
would have voted YES; on Roll Call vote no. 566, I would have voted 
YES; on Roll Call vote no. 567, I would have voted YES; and on Roll 
Call vote no. 568, I would have voted YES.
content.speaker: Ms. ESHOO
